Yes, it absolutely works... Didn't work the first time but then I remembered I have to run it "As Administrator" and it worked AOK

Hi all....

I did include very detailed instructions!!!!!

*****GAME INSTALL*****
----------------------

If you are having trouble with the ISO install try "Virtual Clone Drive", Its light, Easy to use, Works a treat & it's Free!!!!!

Get it here:-

http://www.slysoft.com/en/virtual-clonedrive.html



(Note:-If you are not the Administrator, Right click & Run the Install as "Administrator"!!!!!!!!)

Mount Iso. Install Game using the Keygen in the ViTALiTY folder.

Delete desktop shortcut if there is one!!

Goto C:/Program Files/Mass Effect/Binaries/folder

Copy the MassEffect.exe Crack to this folder & Overwrite.


(Note:-If you are not the Administrator, Right click & run as Admin before you create your desktop short cut!!!!!!)


Create a Shortcut on the Desktop from the new overwriten .exe

Close Folder. 

To play the Game "YOU NEED TO HAVE THE INTERNET DICONNECTED!!!" & either disable or block it threw your firewall.


Play the Game!!!!



*****DLC INSTALLATION*****
--------------------------

(Note:-If you are not the Administrator, Right click & Run the Install's as "Administrator"!!!!!!!!)

First Delete the Mass Effect Desktop Shortcut!

In the Mass Effect DLC Pack folder install the,
01. Bring Down The Sky.exe

Goto   C:/Program Files/Mass Effect/DLC/folder

Again from the Mass Effect DLC Pack folder copy & paste the,
DLC_Vegas folder into it!!!!

Next install the,
03. Mass Effect 1 - Patch 1.02.exe

Finally,
Goto C:/Program Files/Mass Effect/Binaries/folder

Copy the MassEffect.exe Crack from,
the Mass Effect DLC Pack folder to this folder & Overwrite.


(Note:-If you are not the Administrator, Right click & run as Admin before you create your desktop short cut!!!!!!)


Create a Shortcut on the Desktop from the new overwriten .exe

Close Folder.

READ THE "Therum Fix" & apply!!!!!! 

Disconnection from the internet whilst in play is nesassary.

Play the Game!!!!

Follow them instead of thinking you know what to do, I had to spend hours getting info & reading to finally get all the bugs worked out. Iv also have alot of info on ME2 - 3 DL's

At least & Thanks to ViTALiTY Everything including the map worked first up!!!!!

This is a FLAWLESS INSTALL!!!!!!!

Your Welcome
